Ruby amqp gem

An EventMachine-based Ruby RabbitMQ client.

Get Started » Try Bunny! » Read doc guides » Join the Mailing List » Contribute »

RabbitMQ Ruby Client O.G.

The original Ruby RabbitMQ client. Party like it's 2009!

EventMachine-based

All your events are belong to us.

Totally superseded by Bunny

If you aren't already heavily invested in Eventmachine, please use Bunny instead.

Feature complete

Supports all RabbitMQ 3.x features.

Handles flaky networks

First RabbitMQ client ever to support automatic connection recovery.

Quirky

EventMachine is a quirky and opinionated programming model. So is amqp gem.

This website was developed by the  Ruby RabbitMQ Client Maintainers Team.

Follow us on Twitter:  rubyamqp, Michael Klishin, Chris Duncan
